title: New factory Alawar games - September 2014
description:
New factory Alawar games - September 2014

Year: 2014
Genre: business, hidden object, shooting, begalke, quest, arcade, puzzle, kids, balls, three in a row
Developer: Youda Games, Playcamedy, Itera Laboratories & Game House, Big Fish Games & Elephant Games
Publisher:Alawar Entertainment 
Platform: PC
Language: English
Language voice: English
Type of publication: Piratka
Tabletka: Present(crack)

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
Processor: 1Ghz
Memory: 512 Mb RAM,
Video card: 64 Mb VRAM,
Additional software: DirectX 9.0

Description:
New factory Alawar games for September 2014
Alawar Entertainment is a company specializing in the development and distribution of computer games for the mass audience of users on personal computers, mobile platforms, game consoles and other platforms.

Previously, the company Alawar Entertainment specialized in publishing casual games, and now the company has focused on developing and publishing free-to-play games. During the company's work was published in more than 300 private gaming brands.

Installation instructions:

1. Set favourite games relevant .exe files
2. Run the installed game through the shortcut on the desktop. 
3. After the expiration of the trial period, the executable AlawarCrack.exe . In the opened window, click PATCH/PATCH and specify the path to the executable file (.exe) of the game and click on the "Open"button. To specify the startup file of the game (without .wrp in the title)
3. Under the activator window appears that tells us about the success of the operation. Click on the notification "OK", and the activator OUTPUT.
4. Start the game with a shortcut on your desktop. Enjoy the game!

P.S. the menu Activator is video tutorial
